channel.title: Microsoft Teams on Systems Management Squad
channel.description: Recent content in Microsoft Teams on Systems Management Squad

item.title: Microsoft Teams Cache, a burden to us all
item.description: Microsoft Teams Cache, we’ve all been there in the last year and a half. Microsoft Teams is working fine, then it’s not. What happened? I restarted Teams and it’s still acting weird. Well, Teams is an interesting app when it comes to its cache. It relies heavily on it. I personally do not know all the ins and outs of the Teams cache, but I too know all too well that it is a pain in the butt when it goes awry.
